## Starting With Images 

```{r}
require(png)
require(RCurl)
puppy <- readPNG(getURLContent("http://dtkaplan.github.io/ScientificComputing/Resources/Images/mindo.png"))
COMP121::canvas(x= c(1,220), y = c(1,220), asp = 1)
graphics::rasterImage(puppy, 1, 1, 216, 198)
dim(puppy)
```
